name: Hospitable Host
description:
You wake up to the horror of seeing a pricey device making sounds, what's next?

There are 5 endings and one or two more ways to achieve them.

***

**

*

I searched up this month's Bitsy Jam "You can't have it all" a few days ago, and I'm glad I made it on time along with finishing my first full game this Lunar New Year, although at this time I feel like how it is portrayed in this game intends to be easier to understand by me and a few specific groups of people instead of the more general atmosphere I aimed for at first. If you get it from the first try, I think we both had spent quite some time before in front of flash games... 🤝

I hope this silly little game can entertain you for a few minutes.

🎆this game is made in bitsy with some help from transparent sprites hack
